short_summary: one (1) new Rock Screen (Grizzly) to be used for training purposes
description: The Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering (CFSME) requires one (1) new Rock Screen (Grizzly) to be used for training purposes.
full_summary:
---------------

### Government Tender Announcement: W2037-230149 - Grizzly Rock Screen

#### Tender Information

*   **Official Title**: W2037-230149 - Grizzly Concasseur de Roche
*   **Reference Number**: WS4243369059-Doc4267291688
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4243369059
*   **Amendment Number**: 3
*   **Publication Date**: October 19, 2023

#### Tender Status

*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Tender Status**: Expiré
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   **Name**: Danny Arseneau (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   **Email**: danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    *   **Phone**: [None]
    *   **URL for Notice**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17771297?extsite=MTc3NzEyOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

####  Description

Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking offers from qualified bidders to provide one (1) new Rock Screen (Grizzly) to the Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering (CFSME) for training purposes. The Rock Screen will be used to crush large rocks into smaller pieces.

#### Technical Specifications

*   **Classification Code**: UNSPC 22101500 - Earth moving machinery
*   **Procurement Category**: GD (Goods and Services)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) will apply.
*   **Regions of Delivery**: The submission must be delivered to the following address: Oromocto
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: None
*   **Contracting Entity Information**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.
*   **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND), at 101, promenade Colonel By, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada.
*   **Attachment Documents**: None required
